mapper.insert:
select notice_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice values (#{noticeNo},#{title},sysdate,#{content},0)
mapper.select: select notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits from notice where notice_no=#{value}

SELECT notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits FROM( SELECT notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits,CEIL(rownum/5) AS page FROM ( SELECT notice_no,title,to_char(write_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') as write_date,content,hits FROM notice order by notice_no desc ) ) WHERE page=#{value}
mapper.update: update notice set hits=hits+1 where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
mapper.select: select notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits from notice where notice_no=#{value}

SELECT notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits FROM( SELECT notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits,CEIL(rownum/5) AS page FROM ( SELECT notice_no,title,to_char(write_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') as write_date,content,hits FROM notice where title like %#{value}% order by notice_no desc ) ) WHERE page=#{value}

SELECT notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits FROM( SELECT notice_no,title,write_date,content,hits,CEIL(rownum/5) AS page FROM ( SELECT notice_no,title,to_char(write_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') as write_date,content,hits FROM notice where content like %#{value}% order by notice_no desc ) ) WHERE page=#{value}
